code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";var range=1;function HomeNav(_ref){var posts_per_page=_ref.posts_per_page,count=_ref.count;var params=useParams();if(!count||!posts_per_page){return null;}else{var page=params.page?Number(params.page):1;var numPages=Math.ceil(count/posts_per_page);console.log(page);var renderArr=[];if(page!==1)renderArr.push("la");renderArr.push(1);if(page>1+range+1)renderArr.push("dots");for(var i=range;i>=0;i--){if(page-i>1&&page-i!==numPages)renderArr.push(page-i);}for(var _i=1;_i<=range;_i++){if(page+_i<numPages)renderArr.push(page+_i);}if(page+range<numPages-1)renderArr.push("dots");if(numPages!==1)renderArr.push(numPages);if(page!==numPages)renderArr.push("ra");console.log(renderArr);return renderArr.map(function(symbol,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomeNavItem,{symbol:symbol,currPage:page},index);});}}function HomeNavItem(_ref2){var symbol=_ref2.symbol,currPage=_ref2.currPage;if(symbol==="la")return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:currPage===2?"/":"/page/".concat(currPage-1),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-nav-item me-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-arrow-left"})})});else if(symbol==="ra")return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/page/".concat(currPage+1),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-nav-item me-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-arrow-right"})})});else if(symbol==="dots")return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"me-1",children:". . ."});else{if(symbol===currPage)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-nav-item active me-1",children:symbol});else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:symbol===1?"/":"/page/".concat(symbol),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-nav-item me-1",children:symbol})});}}}export default HomeNav;
